name: subgrv
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
-| wrel(csubgr)

cumulated.origin:

|- wi(wbr(c0, csubgr, c1), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))

comment: If a class is a subgraph of another class, both classes are sets. (Contributed by AV, 16-Nov-2020.)
